pages.text: $(li)Guster are hostiles creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l).$(br)$(li)They uses sand like short distance projectile and if a entity or you are too close to them, they will carry it and eject it, like a tornado.$(br)$(li)They may drop sand blocks or a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/guster_eye)Guster Eye$(/l) upon death.
Gusters take damage when in contact with water.
